segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 3
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 3

segments.pli: 3. Puggalavagga
segments.en: 3. Persons

segments.pli: 26. Sevitabbasutta
segments.en: 26. Associates

segments.pli: “Tayome, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: “These three people are found in the world.

segments.pli: Katame tayo?
segments.en: What three?

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
segments.en: There is a person you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend.

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
segments.en: There is a person you should associate with, accompany, and attend.

segments.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
segments.en: There is a person you should associate with, accompany, and attend with honor and respect.

segments.pli: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo?
segments.en: Who is the person you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo hīno hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
segments.en: It’s someone who is inferior in terms of ethics, immersion, and wisdom.

segments.pli: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā.
segments.en: You shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend such a person, except out of kindness and compassion.

segments.pli: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo?
segments.en: Who is the person you should associate with, accompany, and attend?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sadiso hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
segments.en: It’s someone who is similar in terms of ethics, immersion, and wisdom.

segments.pli: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
segments.en: You should associate with, accompany, and attend such a person.

segments.pli: Taṃ kissa hetu?
segments.en: Why is that?

segments.pli: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ sataṃ sīlakathā ca no bhavissati, sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati, sā ca no phāsu bhavissati.
segments.en: Thinking, ‘Since our ethical conduct is similar, we can discuss ethics, the conversation will flow, and we’ll both be at ease.

segments.pli: Samādhisāmaññagatānaṃ sataṃ samādhikathā ca no bhavissati, sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati, sā ca no phāsu bhavissati.
segments.en: Since our immersion is similar, we can discuss immersion, the conversation will flow, and we’ll both be at ease.

segments.pli: Paññāsāmaññagatānaṃ sataṃ paññākathā ca no bhavissati, sā ca no pavattinī bhavissati, sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti.
segments.en: Since our wisdom is similar, we can discuss wisdom, the conversation will flow, and we’ll both be at ease.’

segments.pli: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
segments.en: That’s why you should associate with, accompany, and attend such a person.

segments.pli: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo?
segments.en: Who is the person you should associate with, accompany, and attend with honor and respect?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo adhiko hoti sīlena samādhinā paññāya.
segments.en: It’s someone who is superior in terms of ethics, immersion, and wisdom.

segments.pli: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
segments.en: You should associate with, accompany, and attend such a person with honor and respect.

segments.pli: Taṃ kissa hetu?
segments.en: Why is that?

segments.pli: Iti aparipūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ paripūressāmi, paripūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmi;
segments.en: Thinking, ‘I’ll fulfill the entire spectrum of ethical conduct I haven’t yet fulfilled, or support with wisdom in every situation the ethical conduct I’ve already fulfilled.

segments.pli: aparipūraṃ vā samādhikkhandhaṃ paripūressāmi, paripūraṃ vā samādhikkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmi;
segments.en: I’ll fulfill the entire spectrum of immersion I haven’t yet fulfilled, or support with wisdom in every situation the immersion I’ve already fulfilled.

segments.pli: aparipūraṃ vā paññākkhandhaṃ paripūressāmi, paripūraṃ vā paññākkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti.
segments.en: I’ll fulfill the entire spectrum of wisdom I haven’t yet fulfilled, or support with wisdom in every situation the wisdom I’ve already fulfilled.’

segments.pli: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo sakkatvā garuṃ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
segments.en: That’s why you should associate with, accompany, and attend this person with honor and respect.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasminti.
segments.en: These are the three people found in the world.

segments.pli: Nihīyati puriso nihīnasevī,
segments.en: A man who associates with an inferior goes downhill,

segments.pli: Na ca hāyetha kadāci tulyasevī;
segments.en: but associating with an equal, you’ll never decline;

segments.pli: Seṭṭhamupanamaṃ udeti khippaṃ,
segments.en: following the best, you’ll quickly rise up,

segments.pli: Tasmā attano uttariṃ bhajethā”ti.
segments.en: so you should keep company with people better than you.”

segments.pli: Chaṭṭhaṃ.

sections.title: “These three people are found in the world.

suttaplex.blurb: You should associate with people who are equal or better than you.
